page.title: 14THE LANCASTER CANAL-AN ASSET
page.content: The canal has a lot to offer to the city of Lancaster, it is a pleasant place to walk, a stretch of green grass and water close to the city centre. In some areas new houses built near the canal have taken advantage of this with places to sit near the water, but some of the older houses turn their backs on it, with high walls blocking off the canal. But not everybody appreciates the canal,some scribble graffiti on bridges and drop litter on the towpath. In winter the canal can freeze over and many people have the pleasure of skating and sliding on the ice, but others turn it into a minefield with stones and other missiles thrown onto the ice. Hopefully in the years to come more people will realise that the Lancaster Canal is a great asset to the city.
